article_title: Don't Turn Over IRS Debt Collections To Private Contractors

article_metadata.description: The latest example of why bipartisanship is not necessarily good: A bill proposed by senators Chuck Schumer (D-NY) and Pat Roberts (R-KN) to require the IRS to hire private debt collectors. The last time Congress made the IRS try this, the agency lost money. It was a terrible idea then and it is a terrible idea [...]
article_metadata.author: Business in the Beltway
